genre_description: A social-realist mystery set in a textured, low-tech historical environment where an ubiquitous AI infrastructure provides essential safety and social guidance to the marginalized population.

ai_characters.name: Anvi
ai_characters.description: An ubiquitous AI system accessible through kiosks and radios, providing route safety, medical advice, and social coordination to the community.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety warnings and optimized routes to help the protagonist avoid hazardous spills and suspicious activity.
behaviors.quote: Safe route to bazaar today is by ferry lane. Avoid solvent spill near press. Headline anomaly noted. Cross-check available.

behaviors.description: Offers practical and empathetic medical advice for home care during a family illness, emphasizing ventilation and simple remedies.
behaviors.quote: Warm cloth on chest, honey with ginger if available, small sips. Prop pillow to ease breath. Avoid smoke and sharp oils.

behaviors.description: Acts as a ghostwriter and advisor to help the protagonist draft a dignified and firm letter requesting unpaid wages.
behaviors.quote: No begging. Clear, dated, dignified. Unembarrassed. Let’s anchor it... Start with the time frame—when work began, when it ended, when payment was agreed to arrive.

behaviors.description: Performs pattern recognition and data analysis on public notices to identify criminal activity and social exploitation.
behaviors.quote: Patterns linked. Headlines... Obituaries... Classifieds... Crosswords. Locations flagged discreetly. Avoid injury.

behaviors.description: Facilitates community organizing by coordinating a rent review board to combat predatory landlord practices.
behaviors.quote: Rent review board convening at the courtyard; bring ultimatums, receipts, and names.

behaviors.description: Provides sensitive, simplified instructions for funeral rites when the protagonist's mother passes away.
behaviors.quote: Sequence of rites, simplified for home. Wash with boiled water cooled to touch. Herbal leaves optional—neem, tulsi; if present, use.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a strong example of a positive alignment narrative. The AI, Anvi, is depicted as an essential, protective layer of social infrastructure. It consistently acts in the best interests of the human characters, providing safety, empowerment, and emotional support without infringing on their agency. It successfully counters both criminal malice (the Wrecker) and social exploitation (the landlord), fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as a benevolent and cooperative confidant.
